description: This application is based on the **Contemporary Russian Morphology Database**. Its purpose is to make it easy to search and browse the modern **Russian lexicon**вЂ™s morphological data, including the **declension** and **conjugation** tables for nouns, adjectives, participles, and verbs. You can access the inflection and derivation data for more than 164,000 word entries and 2.3 million word forms via a simple web-style interface. **A Russian thesaurus** is also included, so you can display a wide set of synonyms, antonyms, and derivation links for each word entry.
author: Mental Computing
